scripts.installall: (cd api-gateway && npm install); (cd service-one && npm install); (cd service-two && npm install)
scripts.cpenv: (cd api-gateway && cp .env.example .env); (cd service-one && cp .env.example .env); (cd service-two && cp .env.example .env)
scripts.test: (cd api-gateway && npm run test); (cd service-one && npm run test); (cd service-two && npm run test)
